channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Gibson -- IdeaPush
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Martin Gibson -- IdeaPush

item.title: CVE-2024-37461|2024-08-02T03:57:39.342Z -- martin%20gibson -- ideapush
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Martin Gibson IdeaPush allows Stored XSS.This issue affects IdeaPush: from n/a through 8.65.
